decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: 97 (Existing block plan); 98 (Proposed block plan); 99 (Site location plan); 100 (Existing ground floor plan); 101 (Existing first floor plan); 102 (Existing loft plan); 103 (Existing roof plan); 104 (Existing front elevation); 106 (Existing rear elevation); 107 (Existing section); 108 (Existing side elevation); 108 (Existing site plan); 109 (Existing street scene elevation); 200 (Proposed ground floor plan); 201 (Proposed first floor plan); 202 Rev. A (Proposed loft plan); 203 Rev. A (Proposed roof plan); 204 (Proposed front elevation); 206 Rev. A (Proposed rear elevation); 207 Rev. A (Proposed section); 208 Rev. A (Proposed side elevation); 208 Rev. A (Proposed site plan); 209 (Proposed street scene elevation) (revisions received 08.08.2022)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building on this site.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), the Creffield Conservation Area Management Plan and Appraisal (2007) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the buildings.

Reason: To protect residential amenity in accordance with policies 1.1, 1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing rear addition) with patio; rear dormer roof extension; replacement of window of side elevation dormer; replacement of brick wall to front elevation; repositioning of existing front brick pier on driveway; installation of sliding gate to front elevation; re-landscaping of driveway with new planting bed
